response:
Right-sided spastic hemiparesis with hyperreflexia and extensor plantar, together with predominantly right hemisensory loss and right limb intention tremor/dysmetria, plus vertical downbeat nystagmus and an ipsilateral (left) complete oculomotor palsy (ptosis, dilated pupil, ophthalmoplegia) represent crossed long-tract and cerebellar signs localising to a single lesion in the left midbrain tegmentum affecting the oculomotor fascicle, corticospinal tract and superior cerebellar peduncle; the separate unilateral reduction in visual acuity with right RAPD localises to an additional lesion in the right optic nerve.

lesion_locations = ["left midbrain tegmentum", "right optic nerve"]
